title: [BUG] Failing to download large artifacts through mlflow dashboard

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

body:
### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community.

### MLflow version

1.26

### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Ubuntu Server 20.04 
- **Python version**: 3.8
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**:


### Describe the problem

Not sure if this is a bug. Downloading large experimental artifacts (500MB) through mlflow dashboard is failing leading to an nginx 502 bad gateway.
I am using an mlflow server instance with an nginx as a reverse proxy on a domain.
Not sure if this is a bug or a missing configuration in nginx. Any other minimal file is downloading fine.



### Tracking information

_No response_

### Code to reproduce issue

N/A

### Other info / logs

_No response_
